name: filter
info: Filters applied to this record or empty if record was not filtered

name: varIndex
desc: Variant index from the call source

name: varScore
info: Score assigned by PAV score model

name: segN
info: Number of aligned and unaligned segments in a complex event

name: alignGap
info: For alignment-truncating INVs, the difference between the aligned (inverted) segment and gap between flanking segments (closer to 0 is a clean INV, high numbers point to complex breakpoints)

name: derived
info: Derived from this variant (e.g. a duplication may be derived from an insertion)

name: discord
info: Variant(s) this record is discordant with

name: inner
desc: Variant this record is embedded in

name: qryRegion
column7: Location of this variant in the assembly

name: alignSource
desc: Comma-separated list of alignment indexes supporting this variant
